value: everybody seems to hate the idea that
Trump is staying in Afghanistan
everybody hates that idea except the

the neocons are only on this side
because any time you say the word bombs

when you when you become the president
he bought the house he bought the whole

if you've got a cracked swimming pool in

just ignore the reality that's there you

have
